resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of dedicated Cloud Architect with AWS certification for designing the cloud infrastructure
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Suboptimal cloud architecture leading to performance issues and increased costs
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Charter: Key Deliverables - Cloud infrastructure architecture design document

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Insufficient Database Administrators with experience in migrating SQL Server, Oracle, and MySQL databases
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Delays in database migration and potential data integrity issues

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of specialized database migration tools for efficient and secure data transfer
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Increased migration time and risk of data loss during transfer

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Insufficient security tools for implementing and monitoring cloud security controls
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Increased vulnerability to security breaches and non-compliance with regulations

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Lack of comprehensive training materials for IT staff on cloud operations
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Inefficient management of cloud environment post-migration
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Requirements Document 3.3: Documentation and Training

resource_recommendations.justification: Essential for designing optimal cloud architecture as per Project Charter Key Deliverables
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Engage external consultants instead of hiring full-time staff

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Database Administrator with SQL Server migration experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Critical for migrating 18 SQL Server databases as specified in Project Requirements 2.2
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Utilize cross-functional team members instead of specialized roles

resource_recommendations.justification: Necessary for efficient and secure migration of 28 databases as per Project Requirements 2.2
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use open-source tools instead of commercial software

resource_recommendations.justification: Essential for implementing security controls and ensuring compliance as per Project Requirements 1.4
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Implement automated solutions instead of manual processes

resource_recommendations.justification: Required for knowledge transfer and training IT staff as specified in Project Requirements 3.3
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use virtual training instead of in-person sessions

budget_impact_summary.cost_saving_measures: Implement reserved instances for predictable workloads
